name: Roll! (itch)
description:
Shout out to my friend Vincent for helping me with this game his discord is  Vincent#4475

Still nearly not finished so no start/quit screen, just alt f4

-= Game story = -

A long time ago a ancient tree ruled the lands fueled by his magical heart with 4 pieces. One day the four magpie brothers wanted power and  each stole the 4 heart pieces, consumed by power each heart piece killed the magpies depending on their power.

The ancient tree is but a empty husk of what it used to be and with its last bit of power commands you to find the 4 heart pieces and retrieve it back to him.

-= Gameplay=-

WASD to move around

Pickup crystals to go faster

Find heart shards and return them to the tree, if you can't reach the yellow shard its because you're not fast enough.
